posts.author: zakkbeard
posts.post_text: March 15, 2019 at 4:02 AM#7the wildcard is a marker, so in quotes it won't really get what you need. I don't have the console in front of me, but I THINK it should read like:assign effect 1."stage"*.x /wings=0remember that in the macro, for symmetrical effects, you'll want to add a different line that changes pan values to -2, -4, etc.I have something similar in my punt file for my various effects, but not for changing parameters, I use it for updating the fixture counts of my effects.
